reportincident-report-btn-label: The text for the report button.
reportincident-dialog-close-btn: The tooltip text to use with the close button for a dialog
reportincident-dialog-proceed-btn: The text for the button to move from the information page to the form submission page
reportincident-dialog-back-btn: The text for the button to go back
reportincident-dialog-submit-btn: The text for the button to submit a report
reportincident-dialog-title: The title for the report incident dialog
reportincident-dialog-first-step-cancel-: The text for the button to cancel filing a report
reportincident-dialog-code-of-conduct-li: The text for the link to the Wikimedia Universal Code of Conduct
reportincident-dialog-harassment-type-la: Label for multiple choice to choose harassment type
reportincident-dialog-email-helper-text: The text explaining why email is collected with a report
reportincident-dialog-email-placeholder-: The text explaining whose email needs to be provided
reportincident-dialog-email-input-label: Label for email input on report form
reportincident-dialog-additional-details: Label for additional details input on report form
Placeholder text for additional details input on report form
reportincident-dialog-optional-label: Label for optional field on report form
reportincident-dialog-links-evidence-lab: Label for evidence links on report form
reportincident-dialog-links-evidence-pla: Placeholder to explain what links should be reported
reportincident-dialog-violator-label: Label for who is being reported input on report form
reportincident-dialog-violator-placehold: Placeholder text explaining who is being reported
reportincident-dialog-harassment-type-ha: Label for type of harassment: Hate speech or discrimination
reportincident-dialog-harassment-type-se: Label for type of harassment: Sexual harassment
reportincident-dialog-harassment-type-th: Label for type of harassment: Threats of violence
reportincident-dialog-harassment-type-in: Label for type of harassment: Intimidation, aggression, name calling
reportincident-dialog-harassment-type-so: Label for type of harassment: Something else
reportincident-dialog-harassment-intro-t: Message about Wikipedia's stance on harassment
reportincident-dialog-harassment-lead-in: Lead-in to a list of not tolerated behavior on Wikipedia
reportincident-dialog-harassment-example: Insults, as an example of behavior not tolerated on Wikipedia
Sexual harassment, as an example of behavior not tolerated on Wikipedia
Threats, as an example of behavior not tolerated on Wikipedia
Encouraging harm to others, as an example of behavior not tolerated on Wikipedia
Doxing (disclosure of personal data), as an example of behavior not tolerated on Wikipedia
Hounding, as an example of behavior not tolerated on Wikipedia
Trolling, as an example of behavior not tolerated on Wikipedia
reportincident-dialog-engage-header: Header for text explaining how to engage in dialog
reportincident-dialog-engage-text: Information on how to engage in dialog
reportincident-dialog-admin-review: Explainer text and link of who will review reports
